
a) 0x00000001 -> (1)0000000000000000000000000000001 -> (1)1111111111111111111111111111110 -> (1)1111111111111111111111111111111 -> -1

b) 0x0000012A -> (1)0000000000000000000000100101100 ->
(1)1111111111111111111111011010011 ->
(1)1111111111111111111111011010100 -> -300

c) 0xFFFFFCE6 -> (1)1111111111111111111110011100110 ->
(1)0000000000000000000001100011001 ->
(1)0000000000000000000001100011010 -> -794

d) 0xFFFFFFFF -> (1)1111111111111111111111111111111 ->
(1)0000000000000000000000000000001 -> -1
